content.rendered:
WILDACT – WE ACT FOR WILDLIFE

Established in 2015, WildAct is a non-profit organisation committed to wildlife conservation and protection in Vietnam. Aiming to “Investing in people for a thriving planet”, WildAct works to create lasting change through community-driven initiatives.

With the slogan “We Act for Wildlife”, WildAct is dedicated to taking real action and making a tangible impact – both for wildlife and the people who share their environment.

 Conservation is not just a scientific effort – it is a journey of love and deep respect for nature and all living beings. This website is a hub to tell our story, we hope to inspire you, spark your passion, and share the driving force behind WildAct’s relentless dedication and efforts.

 

OUR CORE METHODS & THEMES

EVIDENCE-BASED CONSERVATION

WildAct’s strategies are guided by real-world insights and cultural understanding. Each solution is practical, adaptable, and deeply rooted in the realities of conservation challenges.

EVIDENCE-BASED CONSERVATION

WildAct’s strategies are guided by real-world insights and cultural understanding. Each solution is practical, adaptable, and deeply rooted in the realities of conservation challenges.

EVIDENCE-BASED CONSERVATION

WildAct’s strategies are guided by real-world insights and cultural understanding. Each solution is practical, adaptable, and deeply rooted in the realities of conservation challenges.

LOCAL & ETHNIC MINORITY EMPOWERMENT

By empowering local communities, WildAct transforms those closest to the problem into key players in the solution.

WOMEN’S LEADERSHIP & EQUITY

WildAct fosters gender equity by enabling conditions for women to lead in conservation, breaking barriers in traditionally male-dominated spaces.

EDUCATION

Through workshops, school programmes, and hands-on activities, WildAct nurtures the next generation of conservationists, fostering a lifelong commitment to protecting biodiversity.

OUR DIFFERENTIATORS

WildAct isn’t just an organisation – it’s a commiment to drive change where it matters most.

Evidence-based Solutions

Our actions are firmly grounded in scientific research and local contexts.

Out-of-the-box actions

We tackle overlooked conservation challenges with innovative solutions.

Community Empowerment

We empower women and local communities to directly participate as conservation leaders in protecting wildlife.

Monitoring &
Evaluation Impact

We deliver tangible results – removing snares, protecting wildlife, and transforming lives.

Culturally Sensitive Approaches

We aim to create solutions that harmonise with community values for lasting change.

OUR IMPACTS

274%

More effective in detecting wildlife traps than traditional method

68%

Of all program beneficiaries are women

33%

Participants received a full-time jobs in conservation sector

The first

Master degree in Biodiversity Conservation established!

Join us to make an even greater impact for wildlife!

ACT FOR WILDLIFE NOW!

OUR COLLABORATION PROGRAMME

BUSINESSES

Keep both your company and the Earth in the green.
We believe a thriving business starts with a thriving planet. Together, we design out-of-the-box, impact-driven solutions that align sustainability with your business vision.

SCHOOL & UNIVERSITY

Join us in shaping a future generation that is compassionate, empathetic, and dedicated to protecting wildlife and the environment.

MEDIA

We believe media is a powerful ally in raising community awareness and inspiring care for the environment and wildlife. Join us in delivering impactful and meaningful news to audiences.

INDIVIDUALS

Every small contribution creates great value.

We offer practical and meaningful ways for you to make a difference as an individual who cares about the environment and wildlife.
